channel.title: Need help with Pi client
channel.description:
hey i just need help with setting up a pi server and client i already downloaded a source and client but when i ran server its good but client when i run it turns black with the red loader saying error connecting to server report problem and i though maybe it was that client so i downloaded another client and samething so im guessing to make pi clients work i gotta do something special? if someone could please help me i would greatly appreciate it
notes to consider. i didint set up a no - ip yet or portforwarded or anything this is new computer i just got jdk and stuff but i should still be able to connect to server on port 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 also i tried to do what most people would say move the cache to c drive done that and stuff but i still cant get it to work. my msn/hotmail is hellykid9595@hotmail.com i am on that mostly all day add me there if yu can help or reply here thanks

item.title: Need help with Pi client
item.dc:creator: @xxterror95xx xxterror95xx
item.description:
@xxterror95xx wrote:

[quote=“iCharizard, post:2, topic:392134”]This would belong in the Client section. && may i ask if it is having issues with the Cache.[/quote] uhmm this is a help section why is it in wrong place…? well sorry i don’t know if theres a specific Client help section i didint see anywhere if it please il look more for it

Edit nvm lol im retarded ima remove and post it in client help i found it lmao

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Pi client
item.dc:creator: @xxterror95xx xxterror95xx
item.description:
@xxterror95xx wrote:

hey i just need help with setting up a pi server and client i already downloaded a source and client but when i ran server its good but client when i run it turns black with the red loader saying error connecting to server report problem and i though maybe it was that client so i downloaded another client and samething so im guessing to make pi clients work i gotta do something special? if someone could please help me i would greatly appreciate it

notes to consider.
i didint set up a no - ip yet or portforwarded or anything this is new computer i just got jdk and stuff but i should still be able to connect to server on port 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1
also i tried to do what most people would say move the cache to c drive done that and stuff but i still cant get it to work.
my msn/hotmail is hellykid9595@hotmail.com i am on that mostly all day add me there if yu can help or reply here thanks
